title: {file}
brief: We disassembled a previously built drive train.
We started on our drivetrain, we got half of it done.

items.label: Disassembling Old Drive Train
items.description: This old drivetrain was built after the previous season by Micah and we are reusing the parts from it. This drivetrain actually used tread, but we decided against using that for this next season.

items.label: Construction of the New Drive Train
Finished Half
items.description: This is the finished half of the drivetrain we had done at the end of the meeting.
